name: Intelligent IT Solutions
description: Founded in 2005, Intelligent IT Solutions offers flexible IT support, professional IT services and expert advice to small and medium-sized businesses throughout the UK. Intelligent IT Solutions work very closely with our clients to ensure an excellent service. They appreciate the way that our affordable and efficient support program gives them access to IT expertise and skills that will help their business to grow and function, whilst enabling them to keep an eye on the bottom line.
